featured.name: MoodSense AI
featured.description: Built an NLP-based app that detects emotions and suggests mood-aligned songs. Trained and compared LSTM-based models using GloVe embeddings.

featured.name: Resume Q&A Chatbot
featured.description: Built an intelligent chatbot to answer resume-related queries using FAISS for vector search and Hugging Face LLMs via LangChain.

featured.name: SMS Spam Classifier
featured.description: Built an NLP spam detector with CountVectorizer and Naive Bayes (97% test accuracy); deployed via interactive Streamlit app.

all.name: House Price Prediction
all.description: Built and deployed a regression model with log-transformed targets; live app features a clean UI with 5 key inputs. Engineered features and used log transformation for improved accuracy.

all.name: Titanic Survival Prediction
all.description: Built and deployed a high-performance classification model (ROC-AUC: 0.88) using engineered features like Title and FamilySize; served via Flask API.

all.name: Cafe Sales Analysis
all.description: Analyzed 10,000+ transactions to identify top items and peak hours. Visualized seasonal sales trends and payment behavior.

all.name: NoteNest
all.description: NoteNest is a Django-based web app with full note management features, including Google login, password change, and complete user authentication.
all.tech: Django Web App with Google Auth

all.name: BG-remover
all.description: A Python-based background remover that allows users to upload an image and download it with background removed using AI image processing.

all.name: PassVault
all.description: PassVault is a secure web-based password manager that allows users to safely store, retrieve, and manage their website credentials.
